Name: Level1
Instructions: I need to get to that pig! Stack a couple of "move forward" blocks together so I can get my eggs back.

Name: Level2
Instructions: Write me a program, so I can make it all the way to the pig.

Name: Level3
Instructions: How should I get to the pig? Make sure I don't run into the stones.

Name: Level4
Instructions: Argh! Write me a program that gets me around the stone and to the pig.

Name: Level5
Instructions: There's a way I can get to the pig using only 2 blocks. Can you figure it out?

Name: Level6
Instructions: Try to get me to the pig using only three blocks.

Name: Level7
Instructions: Write me a program so I can get to the pig using the fewest number of blocks. Try using more than one "repeat times" block.

Name: Level8
Instructions: How many "repeat times" blocks should you use in this level?

Name: Level9
Instructions: I need to get to that pig now! Quick, use the new "repeat until" block.

Name: Level10
Instructions: I can get to the pig in only 3 blocks. Can you write a program for me, please?

Name: Level11
Instructions: Must... get... to sunflower... Can you get me there in just 5 blocks?

Name: Leve12
Instructions: I can make it to the sunflower in 5 blocks. Can you help me get there?

Name: Level13
Instructions: Woah, a new block! Use the new "if" block to let me see if there's a path in another direction. Try to get me to the sunflower in 4 blocks.

Name: Level14
Instructions: How can I get to the sunflower? Use the "if" block to make it happen.

Name: Level15
Instructions: Get me to that sunflower! Try making me turn right if there is a path to the right.

Name: Level16
Instructions: Can you help me get to that tasty sunflower? Use an "if" block to get me there with the fewest number of blocks.

Name: Level17
Instructions: "If-else" blocks checks a condition, and then does one thing or another. Write a program with this new block because I'd really like to get to that sunflower.

Name: Level18
Instructions: Will you help me get to the sunflower for the last time? Make sure to use an "if-else" block!
